design_philosophy.core_concept: You are the Sun, your relationships are Planets. Gravity is attention.
principles: Orbit over List: Visualize distance as emotional closeness.
Glow is Life: Active relationships glow; drifting ones fade.
Motion is Meaning: Floating = alive; Static = dead.
Darkness is Canvas: Use deep slate/void colors, never pure black.

layout.grid_system: Mobile-first, single column. Universe view is a full-screen canvas.

universe_view.description: A full-screen radial layout. Center is User (Sun). Rings are CSS borders.
universe_view.positioning: Absolute positioning based on angle and radius (Orbit JS concept).

buttons.primary: bg-white text-slate-950 hover:bg-slate-200 rounded-full font-bold px-8 py-3 transition-transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(255,255,255,0.3)]
buttons.secondary: bg-slate-800/50 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-full font-medium px-6 py-2 border border-white/10 backdrop-blur-md
buttons.ghost: text-slate-400 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

inputs.default: bg-slate-950/50 border-white/10 focus:border-indigo-500/50 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 text-white placeholder:text-slate-600 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-indigo-500/50 transition-all

cards.planet_card: bg-slate-900/60 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/5 rounded-2xl p-6 shadow-xl hover:border-white/20 transition-all duration-300
cards.meteor_card: bg-indigo-950/30 border border-indigo-500/20 rounded-xl p-4 rotate-1 hover:rotate-0 transition-transform

navigation.dock: fixed bottom-6 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 bg-slate-900/80 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-full p-2 flex gap-2 shadow-2xl z-50

images.description: Deep space nebula with purple glow

technical_instructions.css_overrides: Add custom keyframes for floating and glowing in tailwind.config.js
technical_instructions.mobile_optimization: Use 'touch-action: none' on the canvas to prevent scrolling while panning.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for text, it kills readability on stars.
Use 'backdrop-blur-xl' heavily to make UI readable over the galaxy background.
Planets must be tappable buttons with >44px touch target.
No AI emojis in UI labels.
Use Sonner for toasts (e.g., 'Planet added to orbit').
